

## Pricing Table

| Plan           | License Keys (Admin) | Monthly Subscription Price | Optimize Title and Description (Add-On) | Frame Product Picture (Add-On) | License Key Price (Individual) |
| -------------- | -------------------- | -------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| **Starter**    | 5                    | IDR 20k/month              | IDR 75k/month                           | IDR 55k/month                  | IDR 25k/license/month          |
| **Basic**      | 10                   | IDR 60k/month              | Adjusted lower                          | Adjusted lower                 | IDR 30k/license/month          |
| **Pro**        | 20                   | IDR 85k/month              | Adjusted lower                          | Adjusted lower                 | IDR 40k/license/month          |
| **Enterprise** | Custom               | IDR 100k/month             | Contact us                              | Contact us                     | Contact us                     |

---

### Details by Plan

#### 1. Starter Plan

**Target Audience:** Beginners and hobbyists exploring your platform.

**Features:**

- No limits on Search Products, Scrape Product Details, and Upload Products.
- Data Backup: Included.
- Admin: Max create 5 license keys.

**Benefits:** A cost-effective way to get started and explore the platform's features.

**Call-to-Action:** "Get Started for Just IDR 20k/month"

---

#### 2. Basic Plan

**Target Audience:** Small-scale dropshippers with moderate product management needs.

**Features:**

- No limits on Search Products, Scrape Product Details, and Upload Products.
- Data Backup: Included.
- Admin: Max create 10 license keys.

**Benefits:** Perfect for growing businesses looking to manage more products daily.

**Call-to-Action:** "Upgrade Your Dropshipping Game for Just IDR 60k/month"

---

#### 3. Pro Plan

**Target Audience:** Professional dropshippers scaling their operations.

**Features:**

- No limits on Search Products, Scrape Product Details, and Upload Products.
- Data Backup: Included.
- Admin: Max create 20 license keys.

**Benefits:** Unlock higher limits and automation tools to scale faster.

**Call-to-Action:** "Scale Up Your Business with Pro for Just IDR 85k/month"

---

#### 4. Enterprise Plan

**Target Audience:** Large-scale dropshipping businesses with high-volume requirements.

**Features:**

- No limits on Search Products, Scrape Product Details, and Upload Products.
- Data Backup: Included.
- Admin: Contact us for custom license key limits.
- Dedicated account support.

**Benefits:** Tailored for enterprises looking for unlimited access and premium support.

**Call-to-Action:** "Contact Us for Enterprise Solutions at Just IDR 100k/month"

---

### Add-Ons Pricing Example (Starter Plan)

- **Optimize Title and Description:** IDR 75k/month
- **Frame Product Picture:** IDR 55k/month

> Add-on pricing adjusts based on the subscription plan. Higher plans have discounted add-on prices.
